newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Fifty feared drowned in Bangladesh.
newsitem.headline: Fifty feared drowned in Bangladesh.

text.p: At least 50 people were feared drowned when a ferry capsized in the Dhanu river northeast of Dhaka, the official BSS news agency said.
It said the ferry, carrying some 250 passengers, was overturned by strong currents and sank on Friday. About 200 passengers swam ashore but the rest were missing, the agency said.
Rescuers recovered the body of a boy on Friday night, it said without giving further details.
